component.name: Mint System Backup
component.summary: One-click Linux Mint backup utility for apps, configs, and system data.

description.p: Mint System Backup is a simple yet powerful utility that lets you back up your entire Linux Mint environment — apps, Flatpaks, Snaps, AppImages, configs, and themes — directly into your Documents folder. Designed for both native and Flatpak sandbox environments.

ul.li: Backup APT, Flatpak, Snap & AppImage apps
Save configs, icons, themes, and local data
Runs in Flatpak sandbox with host bridging

description.p: Initial stable release of Mint System Backup.
